fields.name: Dolphins Grace:
fields.value: The nearest non-head Minecraft role near you gets to move twice. In the event that two roles tie for nearest, they both get the buff(1 use)

fields.name: Look for item:
fields.value: Give the Minecraft head a random inventory item.

fields.name: Follow boat:
fields.value: Learn who visits your target, and learn who your target visits.
